questions.questionText: What makes the top animation more realistic?
buttonText3: . (As the car moves, its speed never changes)
. (The car slows down before stopping and speeds up after stopping)

questions.feedbackCorrect: Way to go! Now let's apply this to UI design
questions.feedbackIncorrect: Oops. 'Easing' means the that element accelerates or decelerates

questions.questionText: Which type of animation should you use when adding motion to a UI?
questions.feedbackIncorrect: Oops. It's actually best to avoid linear animations
